description: Try our easy to follow Philly Berry & Muesli Cups recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Muesli,Pescatarian,Seafood free,Blueberry,Quick & easy breakfast,Tree nut free,Egg free,Sesame free,Peanut free
name: Philly Berry & Muesli Cups Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: shaved coconut (strawberry coulis and additional berries, for serving)

recipeInstructions.text: PLACE bananas, raspberries, blueberries and water in a food processor and puree until smooth.
WHISK together the PHILLY, honey, milk and vanilla until smooth.
SPOON approx. 1 tablespoon of muesli into the base of 4 serving glasses. Top with some of the Philly mixture, then spoon on some of the berry mixture. Repeat layering.
FINISH with a dollop of the Philly mixture, a sprinkling of muesli, coconut and coulis. Thread some berries onto toothpicks and serve on top. Enjoy immediately.
